info.name: Questions API - Public Access
info.description: API endpoints for accessing questions without authentication

request.description:
Get all questions from the database without authentication. Returns questions with:
- Basic info (title, description, difficulty, points)
- Sample test cases only
- Hints and constraints
- Templates for all languages (boilerplate, userFunction)
- Does NOT require authentication
- Does NOT filter by room or team
